messages.content:
Take my S3 code below and make it AWS provider v5-compatible and secure:
1) terraform init → validate → plan (no apply)
2) Run security scan (Checkov/policy_engine); summarize High/Med/Low
3) Show a short diff vs my original (highlight: removed inline blocks/ACL/policy; added ownership_controls, public_access_block, split versioning/SSE, new secure policy)
4) If anything still fails, auto-fix and re-run validate/plan/scan; give ≤5-bullet summary of fixes and rationale
5) Output final main.tf
[USE THIS FIXED CODE:]
<paste the hardened HCL from above>

I need more information: Which AWS region would you like to use?
Is this for development, staging, or production?
